TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit ZipFileExtensions extends System.Object
public ref class ZipFileExtensions abstract sealed

span.span: Provides extension methods for the and classes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类仅包含静态方法的扩展和类。The class contains only static methods that extend the and classes. 不创建的实例类; 相反，使用这些方法的实例或。You do not create an instance of the class; instead, you use these methods from instances of or . 若要使用的扩展方法，必须引用`System.IO.Compression.FileSystem`在项目中的程序集。To use the extension methods, you must reference the `System.IO.Compression.FileSystem` assembly in your project. `System.IO.Compression.FileSystem`程序集不在可用[!INCLUDE[win8_appname_long](~/includes/win8-appname-long-md.md)]应用。The `System.IO.Compression.FileSystem` assembly is not available in [!INCLUDE[win8_appname_long](~/includes/win8-appname-long-md.md)] apps. 因此，并类 (在这两个`System.IO.Compression.FileSystem`程序集) 中均不提供[!INCLUDE[win8_appname_long](~/includes/win8-appname-long-md.md)]应用。Therefore, the and classes (both of which are in the `System.IO.Compression.FileSystem` assembly) are not available in [!INCLUDE[win8_appname_long](~/includes/win8-appname-long-md.md)] apps. 在中[!INCLUDE[win8_appname_long](~/includes/win8-appname-long-md.md)]应用程序，您使用的压缩文件使用中的方法， ， ，和。In [!INCLUDE[win8_appname_long](~/includes/win8-appname-long-md.md)] apps, you work with compressed files by using the methods in , , , and . 类包含扩展的四个方法:The class contains four methods that extend : - - - - 类包含两个扩展的方法:The class contains two methods that extend : - - ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何从现有的文件，zip 存档中创建新的条目并提取存档到一个目录的内容。The following example shows how to create a new entry in a zip archive from an existing file, and extract the contents of the archive to a directory. [!code-csharp[System.IO.Compression.ZipArchive#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.io.compression.ziparchive/cs/program3.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.IO.Compression.ZipArchive#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.io.compression.ziparchive/vb/program3.vb#3)] 下面的示例演示如何循环访问的 zip 存档内容并提取扩展名为.txt 的文件。The following example shows how to iterate through the contents of a zip archive and extract files that have a .txt extension. [!code-csharp[System.IO.Compression.ZipArchive#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.io.compression.ziparchive/cs/program1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.IO.Compression.ZipArchive#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.io.compression.ziparchive/vb/program1.vb#1)]

summary.span: 通过将其压缩并将其添加到邮编存档的存档文件。

span.span: Archives a file by compressing it and adding it to the zip archive.

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.IO.Compression.ZipArchiveEntry CreateEntryFromFile (this System.IO.Compression.ZipArchive destination, string sourceFileName, string entryName);

.method public static hidebysig class System.IO.Compression.ZipArchiveEntry CreateEntryFromFile(class System.IO.Compression.ZipArchive destination, string sourceFileName, string entryName) cil managed
<Extension()> Public Function CreateEntryFromFile (destination As ZipArchive, sourceFileName As String, entryName As String) As ZipArchiveEntry
static member CreateEntryFromFile : System.IO.Compression.ZipArchive * string * string -> System.IO.Compression.ZipArchiveEntry

param.name: destination
param.span: 若要添加到文件的 zip 存档。

span.span: The zip archive to add the file to.

param.name: sourceFileName
param.span: 要存档的文件路径。

span.span: The path to the file to be archived.

param.span: 可以指定相对或绝对路径。

span.span: You can specify either a relative or an absolute path.

param.span: 相对路径是指相对于当前工作目录的路径。

span.span: A relative path is interpreted as relative to the current working directory.

param.name: entryName
param.span: 要创建在 zip 存档中的项的名称。

span.span: The name of the entry to create in the zip archive.

summary.span: 通过将其压缩并将其添加到邮编存档的存档文件。

span.span: Archives a file by compressing it and adding it to the zip archive.

returns.span: 在 zip 存档中新项的包装器。

span.span: A wrapper for the new entry in the zip archive.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 存档中的新项包含指定的文件的内容`sourceFileName`。The new entry in the archive contains the contents of the file specified by `sourceFileName`. 如果具有指定名称的条目 (`entryName`) 已存在具有相同名称在存档中创建一个第二个条目。If an entry with the specified name (`entryName`) already exists in the archive, a second entry is created with an identical name. 条目的属性设置为最后一个文件系统上的文件的更改的时间。The property of the entry is set to the last time the file on the file system was changed. 当`ZipArchiveMode.Update`存在，则条目的大小限制仅限于。When `ZipArchiveMode.Update` is present, the size limit of an entry is limited to . 此限制是因为更新模式使用在内部以允许查找所需更新存档时和有一个最大 int 的大小等于This limit is because update mode uses a internally to allow the seeking required when updating an archive, and has a maximum equal to the size of an int. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何从现有的文件的 zip 存档中创建新的条目。The following example shows how to create a new entry in a zip archive from an existing file. [!code-csharp[System.IO.Compression.ZipArchive#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.io.compression.ziparchive/cs/program3.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.IO.Compression.ZipArchive#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.io.compression.ziparchive/vb/program3.vb#3)]

span.span: The file specified by cannot be opened, or is too large to be updated (current limit is [`Int32.MaxValue`](https://docs.microsoft.com/dotnet/api/system.int32.maxvalue)).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 存档中的新项包含指定的文件的内容`sourceFileName`。The new entry in the archive contains the contents of the file specified by `sourceFileName`. 如果具有指定名称的条目 (`entryName`) 已存在具有相同名称在存档中创建一个第二个条目。If an entry with the specified name (`entryName`) already exists in the archive, a second entry is created with an identical name. 条目的属性设置为最后一个文件系统上的文件的更改的时间。The property of the entry is set to the last time the file on the file system was changed. 当`ZipArchiveMode.Update`存在，则条目的大小限制仅限于。When `ZipArchiveMode.Update` is present, the size limit of an entry is limited to . 此限制是因为更新模式使用在内部以允许查找所需更新存档时和有一个最大 int 的大小等于This limit is because update mode uses a internally to allow the seeking required when updating an archive, and has a maximum equal to the size of an int. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何从现有的文件，zip 存档中创建新的条目，然后指定压缩级别。The following example shows how to create a new entry in a zip archive from an existing file, and specify the compression level. MemberSignature.Value: public static void ExtractToDirectory (this System.IO.Compression.ZipArchive source, string destinationDirectoryName);
.method public static hidebysig void ExtractToDirectory(class System.IO.Compression.ZipArchive source, string destinationDirectoryName) cil managed
<Extension()> Public Sub ExtractToDirectory (source As ZipArchive, destinationDirectoryName As String)
static member ExtractToDirectory : System.IO.Compression.ZipArchive * string -> unit

param.name: source
param.span: 从中提取文件的 zip 存档。

span.span: The zip archive to extract files from.

param.name: destinationDirectoryName
param.span: 要在其中放置解压缩的文件的目录路径。

span.span: The path to the directory to place the extracted files in.

param.span: 可以指定相对或绝对路径。

span.span: You can specify either a relative or an absolute path.

param.span: 相对路径是指相对于当前工作目录的路径。

span.span: A relative path is interpreted as relative to the current working directory.

summary.span: 将 zip 存档中的所有文件都解压缩到文件系统的一个目录下。

span.span: Extracts all the files in the zip archive to a directory on the file system.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法创建指定的目录`destinationDirectoryName`。This method creates the directory specified by `destinationDirectoryName`. 如果目标目录已存在，此方法不会覆盖它;它会引发异常。If the destination directory already exists, this method does not overwrite it; it throws an exception. 该方法还会创建反映在 zip 存档中的层次结构的子目录。The method also creates subdirectories that reflect the hierarchy in the zip archive. 如果在提取过程中发生错误，存档将保持部分提取。If an error occurs during extraction, the archive remains partially extracted. 每个提取的文件具有指定的目录的同一相对路径`destinationDirectoryName`作为其源项已存档的根。Each extracted file has the same relative path to the directory specified by `destinationDirectoryName` as its source entry has to the root of the archive. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何从现有的文件，zip 存档中创建新的条目并将存档解压缩到新目录。The following example shows how to create a new entry in a zip archive from an existing file, and extract the archive to a new directory. 到编译器的顺序此代码示例中，你必须引用`System.IO.Compression`和`System.IO.Compression.FileSystem`你的项目中的程序集。In order to compiler this code example, you must reference the `System.IO.Compression` and `System.IO.Compression.FileSystem` assemblies in your project. [!code-csharp[System.IO.Compression.ZipArchive#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.io.compression.ziparchive/cs/program3.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.IO.Compression.ZipArchive#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.io.compression.ziparchive/vb/program3.vb#3)]

span.span: (For example, this might happen if the entry name contains parent directory accessors.)

contains an invalid format.

span.span: An archive entry was compressed by using a compression method that is not supported.

param.name: source
param.span: 提取。

span.span: The to extract.

param.span: 在文件系统上的目标目录路径。

span.span: The path can be relative or absolute.

summary.span: 提取所有文件系统上存档到一个目录中的文件。

span.span: Extracts all of the files in the archive to a directory on the file system.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 指定的目录可能已存在。The specified directory may already exist. 此方法将创建指定的目录及所有子目录，如有必要。This method will create the specified directory and all subdirectories if necessary. 如果提取存档时出错，存档将保持部分提取。If there is an error while extracting the archive, the archive will remain partially extracted. 将提取的每个条目，从而使提取的文件具有的相同相对路径`destinationDirectoryName`如条目已存档的根。Each entry will be extracted such that the extracted file has the same relative path to `destinationDirectoryName` as the entry has to the root of the archive. 如果要存档的文件具有无效上一次将使用修改后的时间，第一个日期和时间 Zip 时间戳格式 （1980 年 1 月 1 日午夜） 中可表示。If a file to be archived has an invalid last modified time, the first date and time representable in the Zip timestamp format (midnight on January 1, 1980) will be used.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果目标文件已存在，此方法不会覆盖它;它会引发异常。If the destination file already exists, this method does not overwrite it; it throws an exception. 若要覆盖现有文件，请使用方法重载。To overwrite an existing file, use the method overload instead. 该文件的上次编写时间设置为 zip 存档中的项的更改; 最后一个时间此值存储在属性。The last write time of the file is set to the last time the entry in the zip archive was changed; this value is stored in the property. 不能使用此方法提取目录，则使用方法相反。You cannot use this method to extract a directory; use the method instead. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何循环访问 zip 存档文件的内容并提取扩展名为.txt 的文件。The following example shows how to iterate through the contents of a zip archive file and extract files that have a .txt extension. param.span: 如果覆盖与目标文件同名的现有文件，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: to overwrite an existing file that has the same name as the destination file; otherwise, .

summary.span: 将 zip 存档中的条目解压缩到文件下，并可选择覆盖具有相同名称的现有文件。

span.span: Extracts an entry in the zip archive to a file, and optionally overwrites an existing file that has the same name.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 该文件的上次编写时间设置为 zip 存档中的项的更改; 最后一个时间此值存储在属性。The last write time of the file is set to the last time the entry in the zip archive was changed; this value is stored in the property. 不能使用此方法提取目录，则使用方法相反。You cannot use this method to extract a directory; use the method instead. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何循环访问 zip 存档文件的内容并提取扩展名为.txt 的文件。The following example shows how to iterate through the contents of a zip archive file, and extract files that have a .txt extension. 它将覆盖目标文件夹中具有相同名称的现有文件。It overwrites an existing file that has the same name in the destination folder. 到编译器的顺序此代码示例中，你必须引用`System.IO.Compression`和`System.IO.Compression.FileSystem`你的项目中的程序集。In order to compiler this code example, you must reference the `System.IO.Compression` and `System.IO.Compression.FileSystem` assemblies in your project. [!code-csharp[System.IO.Compression.ZipArchive#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.io.compression.ziparchive/cs/program2.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.IO.Compression.ZipArchive#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.io.compression.ziparchive/vb/program2.vb#2)]

exception.span: 指定的路径和/或文件名超过了系统定义的最大长度。

span.span: The specified path, file name, or both exceed the system-defined maximum length.

exception.span: 指定的路径无效（例如，它位于未映射的驱动器上）。

span.span: The specified path is invalid (for example, it is on an unmapped drive).
already exists and is .

exception.span: 该条目当前处于打开状态，可以写入。

span.span: The entry is currently open for writing.
-or-

exception.span: 该条目已从存档中删除。

span.span: The entry has been deleted from the archive.

exception.span: 调用方没有创建新文件所需的权限。

span.span: The caller does not have the required permission to create the new file.

exception.span: 存档中缺少该条目，或者该条目已损坏且无法读取。

span.span: The entry is missing from the archive or is corrupt and cannot be read.
-or-

exception.span: 已经通过使用一种不受支持的压缩方法压缩该条目。

span.span: The entry has been compressed by using a compression method that is not supported.

exception.span: 已释放该条目所属的 zip 存档。

span.span: The zip archive that this entry belongs to has been disposed.
is in an invalid format.

exception.span: 该条目的 zip 存档是在 模式中打开的，不允许检索条目。

span.span: The zip archive for this entry was opened in mode, which does not permit the retrieval of entries.
